ValidationRule.description: When a Lead with Operating Company 'Noordhoff Professional' is created, either Email, Phone or Mobile should be filled (at least 1 of 3)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c, "Noordhoff Professional"), AND(ISBLANK(Email), ISBLANK(MobilePhone), ISBLANK(Phone)), false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Either email, mobile or phone should be filled
